channel.title: What source to start with?
channel.description:
I'm planning to try to create a rsps so I searched around for sources and found runesource, pi and asteria. The source I'm looking for should be stable and if possible have no skills as I'm only making a server in order to learn so having as little as possible is nice. (sadly I lack the knowledge to start a server from scratch) Anyhow I'm wondering what sources other people prefer.
frozenx2p
edit: I am currently inbetween asteria and hyperion, but I'm open to any other suggestions.

item.title: What source to start with?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“malimt, post:5, topic:547514”]Why not start with a Simple PI
EXAMPLE; Insidia/Trisidia… DeathlyPvpz… Epicurus… There’s a lot of PI Re-makes out there…[/quote]
Die please.
Anything Trisidia or deathly pvpz you should NOT start with. Why? They’re terrible. All they will teach is poor programming habits.

PI is a really common one to start with, yes, but it’s arguably one of the worse servers because of how it was wrote.
Apollo or Hyperion are better.

317 is one of the most documented revisions we have.

Read full topic

item.title: What source to start with?
item.dc:creator: @Limnic Limnic
item.description:
@Limnic wrote:

Yes but imo 317 is too old, I’d go for 498 or something then. Ofcourse there’s alot more documentation for 317.

Read full topic

item.title: What source to start with?
item.dc:creator: @taffzimo taffzimo
item.description:
@taffzimo wrote:

Limnic:

If I were you I would go for 508+ just because there’s more stuff to do and it’s a little better established. Also a little harder. So it’s all up to you.

Nah I don’t like all of the extra crap that comes along it, I prefer the older version.

Read full topic
